text: Yaacov Zilberman (born May 26, 1954 in the Soviet Union) is an Israeli and former Soviet chess player. He became a grandmaster in 1998. Zilberman participated in the 30th Chess Olympiad at Manila in 1992. With Robert HÃ¼bner and Ivan Morovic he was first at the Capablanca Memorial, Elite at Havana in 1998. == References == * Yaacov Zilberman, Chessgames.com Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Jewish Israeli sportspeople Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Soviet chess players
title: Yaacov Zilberman
